column1: Table 11: Number and estimated percentage of sentenced prisoners under State jurisdiction, by offense, gender, race, and Hispanic origin, yearend 2004
Author(s): William J. Sabol, Heather Couture, and Paige M. Harrison
Table 11. Number and estimated percentage of sentenced prisoners under State jurisdiction, by offense, gender, race, and Hispanic origin, yearend 2004

Note: Data are for inmates with a sentence of more than 1 year under the jurisdiction of State correctional authorities. For estimates, see Methodology. Detail may not add to total due to rounding.  See Appendix tables 9 and 10 for detailed offense categories.
